Monday May 8, 2017

Progress

A lot of refactoring in my Vue components were needed today. I was able to dynamically generate pagination links on the guide step edit page.

Thoughts

VueJS provides a really nice workflow and the debugging capabilities are more impressive than I anticipated. I have not really had to rely on console.log() very much at all, which is nice.

Daily Commits

  1. refactoring of vue views
  2. more refactoring and figuring things out
  3. make urls for guide, edit-introduction, and edit-steps pages include ids
  4. 90% of all links are working
  5. some Vue refactoring
  6. edit guide steps tab shows correct step when clicking on relative links
  7. more Vue refactoring
  8. implement previous and next dynamic links
